name: Drew Fustini
cooked:
FYI - I have setup a pre-Summit fundraiser to benefit the Ada Lovelace Fellowship:

Pre Open Hardware Summit meetup and Ada Lovelace Fellowship fundraiser at Artisan’s Asylum

DATE AND TIME:
Wed, September 26, 2018
6:00 PM – 8:00 PM EDT

LOCATION:
Artisan’s Asylum
10 Tyler Street
Somerville, MA 02143

The annual Open Hardware Summit (OHS) will occur on Thursday, September 27th, at MIT. Local makerspace Artisan’s Asylum and staff member Jimmie Rodgers have agreed to host a meetup for those that are in town for the OHS.

This event is free to attend but donations are encouraged to the Ada Lovelace Fellowship
raw:
FYI - I have setup a pre-Summit fundraiser to benefit the Ada Lovelace Fellowship:

**[Pre Open Hardware Summit meetup and Ada Lovelace Fellowship fundraiser at Artisan's Asylum](https://www.eventbrite.com/e/pre-open-hardware-summit-meetup-and-fellowship-fundraiser-tickets-50343178803)**

DATE AND TIME:
Wed, September 26, 2018
6:00 PM – 8:00 PM EDT

LOCATION:
Artisan's Asylum
10 Tyler Street
Somerville, MA 02143

The annual Open Hardware Summit (OHS) will occur on Thursday, September 27th, at MIT. Local makerspace Artisan's Asylum and staff member Jimmie Rodgers have agreed to host a meetup for those that are in town for the OHS.

**This event is free to attend but [donations are encouraged to the Ada Lovelace Fellowship](https://www.eventbrite.com/e/pre-open-hardware-summit-meetup-and-fellowship-fundraiser-tickets-50343178803)**
